name: Monster Rebirth
description:
Made for the 2022 IGMC Game Jam.

The evil has destory almost the world.

The monsters you beat in the dungeon will join you party.

That's what we call "Monster Rebirth", or the resurrection of monsters from the dark.

And we could fight until the last monster dead in your party.

Features.

47 kind of monsters could join your party

you could use all your monsters in a battle without limited.

197 synthetic organisms in this game, you can make your own monster.

4 Roguelike dungeon.
